languages.text: {n}Абеляр порывается что-то сказать, но в последний момент останавливает себя. Морщинки на его лбу разглаживаются.{/n} "Я понимаю, Лорд-Капитан. Что ж, в таком случае — забудьте то, о чем я сказал. Мое место — подле Лорд-капитана, ибо таков мой долг сенешаля".

{n}Abelard rushes to say something but stops himself at the last moment. The furrows on his brow smooth out.{/n} "I understand, Lord Captain. Well, in that case, forget what I said. My place is at the Lord Captain's side, for that is my duty as Seneschal."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр порывается что-то сказать, но в последний момент останавливает себя. Морщинки на его лбу разглаживаются.{/n} "Я понимаю, Лорд-Капитан. Что ж, в таком случае — забудьте то, о чем я сказал. Мое место — подле Лорд-капитана, ибо таков мой долг сенешаля".

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard abre la boca para hablar, pero en el último momento decide callar. Las arrugas de su frente se alisan.{/n} «Entiendo, Lord Capitán. En ese caso, olvide lo que he dicho. Mi sitio está al lado del Lord Capitán, pues tal es mi deber como senescal».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard rushes to say something but stops himself at the last moment. The furrows on his brow smooth out.{/n} "I understand, Lord Captain. Well, in that case, forget what I said. My place is at the Lord Captain's side, for that is my duty as Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard abre la boca para hablar, pero en el último momento decide callar. Las arrugas de su frente se alisan.{/n} «Entiendo, Lord Capitán. En ese caso, olvide lo que he dicho. Mi sitio está al lado del Lord Capitán, pues tal es mi deber como senescal».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは慌てて何かを言おうとしたが、すんでのところで思いとどまる。眉間のしわが元に戻った。{/n}「承知いたしました、ロード・キャプテン。では、私が言ったことはお忘れください。私の居場所はロード・キャプテンのお側にあります。それが私の家令長としての務めです」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard rushes to say something but stops himself at the last moment. The furrows on his brow smooth out.{/n} "I understand, Lord Captain. Well, in that case, forget what I said. My place is at the Lord Captain's side, for that is my duty as Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは慌てて何かを言おうとしたが、すんでのところで思いとどまる。眉間のしわが元に戻った。{/n}「承知いたしました、ロード・キャプテン。では、私が言ったことはお忘れください。私の居場所はロード・キャプテンのお側にあります。それが私の家令長としての務めです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德似乎想说些什么，但到了最后一刻，他打住了，额头上的皱纹逐渐展平。{/n}“我明白了，舰长大人。既然如此，就忘了我说的那些话吧。我只属于领主舰长身边，因为这是我身为总领的职责。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard rushes to say something but stops himself at the last moment. The furrows on his brow smooth out.{/n} "I understand, Lord Captain. Well, in that case, forget what I said. My place is at the Lord Captain's side, for that is my duty as Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德似乎想说些什么，但到了最后一刻，他打住了，额头上的皱纹逐渐展平。{/n}“我明白了，舰长大人。既然如此，就忘了我说的那些话吧。我只属于领主舰长身边，因为这是我身为总领的职责。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard s'apprête à dire quelque chose, mais s'interrompt au dernier moment. Les rides de son front s'estompent.{/n} « Je comprends, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Dans ce cas, oubliez ce que je viens de dire. Ma place est à vos côtés, car tel est mon devoir de sénéchal. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard rushes to say something but stops himself at the last moment. The furrows on his brow smooth out.{/n} "I understand, Lord Captain. Well, in that case, forget what I said. My place is at the Lord Captain's side, for that is my duty as Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard s'apprête à dire quelque chose, mais s'interrompt au dernier moment. Les rides de son front s'estompent.{/n} « Je comprends, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Dans ce cas, oubliez ce que je viens de dire. Ma place est à vos côtés, car tel est mon devoir de sénéchal. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard setzt an, etwas zu sagen, bremst sich jedoch im letzten Augenblick. Die Falten auf seiner Stirn verschwinden.{/n} "Ich verstehe, Lord Captain. Nun, wenn das so ist, habe ich nichts gesagt. Mein Platz ist an der Seite des Lord Captains, denn das ist meine Pflicht als Truchsess."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard rushes to say something but stops himself at the last moment. The furrows on his brow smooth out.{/n} "I understand, Lord Captain. Well, in that case, forget what I said. My place is at the Lord Captain's side, for that is my duty as Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard setzt an, etwas zu sagen, bremst sich jedoch im letzten Augenblick. Die Falten auf seiner Stirn verschwinden.{/n} "Ich verstehe, Lord Captain. Nun, wenn das so ist, habe ich nichts gesagt. Mein Platz ist an der Seite des Lord Captains, denn das ist meine Pflicht als Truchsess."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard rushes to say something but stops himself at the last moment. The furrows on his brow smooth out.{/n} "I understand, Lord Captain. Well, in that case, forget what I said. My place is at the Lord Captain's side, for that is my duty as Seneschal."

languages.text: {n}Abelard, bir hışımla yanıt verecekken son anda kendine mâni oluyor. Çattığı kaşları yavaşça gevşiyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum Lord Kaptan. O hâlde söylediklerimi unutun. Benim yerim, Lord Kaptan'ın yanıdır. Seneşal olarak vazifem budur."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard rushes to say something but stops himself at the last moment. The furrows on his brow smooth out.{/n} "I understand, Lord Captain. Well, in that case, forget what I said. My place is at the Lord Captain's side, for that is my duty as Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard bir hışımla yanıt verecekken son anda kendine mani oluyor. Çattığı kaşları, yavaşça gevşiyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum Lord Kaptan. O hâlde söylediklerimi unutun. Benim yerim, Lord Kaptan'ın yanıdır. Seneşal olarak vazifem budur."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
